mapper.sql: type_id, type_name, type_address, type_structure, type_area, type_label, type_img, type_describe,type_room,type_office,type_kitchen, type_guard,newhouse_id
mapper.select:
select
from house_type
and type_name like concat(concat('%',#{typeName}),'%')
order by type_id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into house_type
type_name,
type_address,
type_structure,
type_area,
type_label,
type_img,
type_describe,
type_room,
type_office,
type_kitchen,
type_guard,
newhouse_id,
#{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{typeLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeKitchen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeGuard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{newhouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update house_type
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_address = #{typeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_structure = #{typeStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_area = #{typeArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type_label = #{typeLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_img = #{typeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_describe = #{typeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_room = #{typeRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_office = #{typeOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_kitchen = #{typeKitchen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_guard = #{typeGuard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newhouse_id = #{newhouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update house_type set type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_address = #{typeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_structure = #{typeStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_area = #{typeArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_label = #{typeLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_img = #{typeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_describe = #{typeDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
